metadata.title: Customizable Rules | FoglaljOnline
metadata.description: 50+ configuration options: opening hours, table management, booking limits, email notifications. You define every rule.

hero.title: You define
hero.description: 50+ configuration options for perfect operation. Opening hours, table management, booking limits, email notifications ‚Äì all in one place.

demo.title: Rules in
demo.subtitle: Click on rule types to see how they work

rules.name: Weekly hours
rules.description: Standard opening hours for each day

rules.name: Special days
rules.description: Holidays and unique events

rules.name: Closure periods

rules.name: Duration rules
rules.description: Guest count-based time limits

autoApplication.label: Automatic application:
autoApplication.weekly: Every day, the appropriate opening hours automatically appear on the booking form.
autoApplication.special: On special days, the system automatically overrides the standard opening hours.
autoApplication.closure: During closure periods, bookings cannot be made, but the restaurant operates.
autoApplication.duration: Available durations automatically appear based on guest count.

mainFeatures.title: Opening hours management
mainFeatures.description: Weekly opening hours, special days, closure periods. Every day fully customizable.

mainFeatures.title: Table combining
mainFeatures.description: Automatic merging of smaller tables for larger groups. Optimal utilization.

mainFeatures.title: Overbooking control
mainFeatures.description: Set maximum oversizing ratio. Example: 4-seat table max. 5 guests.

mainFeatures.title: Guest count limits
mainFeatures.description: Maximum guest count, minimum and maximum booking times, automatic approval.

allRules.title: Complete
allRules.subtitle: 50+ rules and settings for perfect restaurant operation

rules.name: Weekly opening hours
rules.description: Separate opening, closing and kitchen closing times for each day

rules.name: Special days
rules.description: Holidays, closures, modified opening hours management

rules.name: Recurring rules
rules.description: Weekly recurring special settings

rules.name: Closure periods
rules.description: Intra-day breaks (e.g. afternoon closure 2-5 PM)

rules.name: Booking time limits
rules.description: How far in advance to book (minimum: 2 hours, maximum: 30 days)

rules.name: Duration rules
rules.description: Guest count-based durations (e.g. 6+ guests ‚Üí 3-5 hours available)

rules.name: Table combining
rules.description: Automatic merging of smaller tables for larger groups

rules.name: Overbooking control
rules.description: Max. oversizing ratio (e.g. 100% = double guests allowed)

rules.name: Area management
rules.description: Indoor, patio, private room with separate settings

rules.name: Maximum guest count
rules.description: Restaurant-level guest count limit setting

rules.name: Table definitions
rules.description: Table counts and capacities per area

rules.name: Automatic approval
rules.description: Instant booking approval or manual verification

rules.name: Same-day booking block
rules.description: Block same-day bookings after opening (advance only)

rules.name: Period-based booking block
rules.description: Disable online booking on special days (phone only)

rules.name: Book until closing
rules.description: Can book until closing time or only X hours before

rules.name: Ignore kitchen closing
rules.description: Allow booking after kitchen closes (drinks only)

rules.name: Allow cancellation
rules.description: Can guests cancel bookings online

rules.name: Minimum cancellation time
rules.description: How far before booking can be cancelled (e.g. 2 hours)

rules.name: Cancellation email
rules.description: Send automatic email on cancellation

rules.name: Cancellation reason required
rules.description: Must guest provide reason for cancellation

rules.name: Custom message
rules.description: Display own cancellation policy text

rules.name: Booking confirmation
rules.description: Send email immediately after booking

rules.name: Pending email
rules.description: Email if booking awaits approval

rules.name: Cancellation notification
rules.description: Send email when booking is cancelled

rules.name: Modification notification
rules.description: Email when booking details change

rules.name: Rejection email
rules.description: Email when restaurant rejects a booking

rules.name: Reminder email
rules.description: Email X hours before booking (e.g. 24 hours)

rules.name: Feedback request
rules.description: Email X hours after booking (e.g. 2-4 hours)

rules.name: Restaurant notifications
rules.description: Send email to restaurant for every new booking

rules.name: Time slot length
rules.description: Booking slot length in minutes (e.g. 15, 30 minutes)

rules.name: Available durations
rules.description: Selectable durations (e.g. 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5 hours)

rules.name: Guest count-based duration
rules.description: Different durations on special days by party size

complexExample.title: Example: Modern Restaurant Complete Setup
complexExample.subtitle: This is what a complete restaurant rule system looks like in practice

automation.title: Automatic operation
automation.description: The system automatically applies all settings. Every booking follows the appropriate rules - opening hours, capacity, duration, email notifications. No manual work!

items.title: Maximum control
items.description: You control every aspect of the booking system. It works exactly as you want.

items.title: Automation
items.description: Set it once, then it works automatically. No daily manual tasks or adjustments.

items.title: Error prevention
items.description: System doesn't allow bookings that don't comply with rules. Protection against overbooking.

items.title: Better guest experience
items.description: Guests see options clearly. No misunderstanding, no conflict.

items.title: Optimized revenue
items.description: Table combining, overbooking, dynamic durations - everything for revenue maximization.

items.title: Automatic communication
items.description: Email notifications, reminders, feedback requests - everything goes automatically.

finalCta.title: Configure your restaurant to your own needs!
finalCta.description: 30-day free trial, no credit card required. Start using the complete rule system today!
